code:
flowchart LR
    %% Direct Control vs WebUI+Coordinator Comparison

    %% WebUI (works everywhere)
    webui@{ shape: circle, label: "**WebUI**" }

    %% LAN Components
    subgraph lan["**LAN**"]
        subgraph controller["Controller"]
            direct_control@{ shape: docs, label: "Direct Control Script" }
            coordinator@{ shape: div-proc, label: "Coordinator" }
        end
        host@{ shape: div-proc, label: "Host" }
    end

    %% Relationships
    webui <--> |"serves/**controls**"| coordinator
    controller --> |"**startup**"| host
    controller --> |"**shutdown**"| host
    webui -.-> |"controls *outside* of **LAN**"| host

    class lan lan
    class webui webui
    class coordinator coordinator
    class direct_control direct_control
    class host host
repo_description: A neat helper that manages the standby state of unix and windows hosts with Wake-On-Lan (WOL) configured, with Web-GUI.
